description.narrative:
Development Impact: - To consumers, the Project is expected to deliver high quality natural ingredients at a larger scale, which will in turn be used in various consumer goods, such as healthcare products, processed foods, cosmetics etc.
- To employees, the Project can create new knowledge of production technologies and train staff to fill gaps in the current job market that is facing a shortage of highly skilled talents in food manufacturing and safety monitoring.
- To suppliers and distributors, the Project will engage various actors, domestic and global, in the value chain for products and services. It will also help improve the quality standards of food exporters in China.
Market Impact:
By supporting a global provider of natural pigments and extracts that generates 30+% of revenue through exports, IFC hopes to raise the quality and competitiveness of natural ingredients that are used broadly in industrial value chains, to increase visibility of Chinese companies with sophisticated technologies, to promote South-South investment between China and India.

The objective of the proposed investment of up to US$40 million for Chenggang Biotech Group Co., Ltd. (Chenguang or the Company) is to support the Companys permanent working capital needs to increase production. Chenguang is a leading producer of natural, plant-based food extracts and additives in China. The Company currently sources raw materials from Xinjiang, China and Andhra Pradesh, India, and is looking to expand its sourcing footprint to Africa.
